channel.title: Some piano music - By HAYVN
channel.description:
I woke up extremely exhausted today and apparently decided to write a 5 min and a half piano piece. I hope my emotions while writing this will convey. This song is the most precious to me.
**Link:** [soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/hayvn/kayne)
It's going to be my last song for some time.

item.title: Some piano music - By HAYVN
item.dc:creator: tornait
item.description:
I don’t want you to give up. As I used to say to all of my friends, I’m the only person who’s supposed to give up.

Taking that into account, don’t give up. Please. Your music is beautiful. And loved. Nobody’s got a style like you… but at the same time, just relax. Don’t push yourself. If you need another hiatus, take it. Just come back next time, raring to go.

Read full topic

item.title: Some piano music - By HAYVN
item.dc:creator: anon64827621
item.description:
I just wanted to say how much hearing that means to me. But as you said:

wagneric:

Words are insufficient.

Thank you for giving me a bit of your time with this comment, you truly brightened up my day.

Read full topic

item.title: Some piano music - By HAYVN
item.dc:creator: wagneric
item.description:
This is clearly your language. I encourage you to keep speaking it, even if you never share any of it. Words are insufficient.

Read full topic
